location: North University Park: 514 West Adams St., (near Figueroa St.) Los Angeles, CA 90007
medium: 24-carat gold and other Italian moasic tiles
description: Artist: Derek John Taylor and other artists from Judson Studios. The gold mosaic symbolizes eternity. Jesus Christ appears as judge (holding the bible) on the south wall, and as the Good Shepard on the north wall. The mosaic murals found elsewhere in the church were all done much earlier, probably in the 1930s and 40sPhoto: © Robin Dunitz
